The Chronicles Project is a music concept featuring musicians from all over the world, 5 different singers and a mixture of different metal styles.
Their mainly music inspiration - many metal & hard rock bands, such as: Iron Maiden, Kamelot, Masterplan, Symphony X and too many to count...

Current Line-up:
Dave Esser - vocals & narrations (Germany)
Patricia Romera Holgado - vocals (Spain)
Vasilis Georgiou - vocals (Greece)
Andi Kravljaca - vocals (Sweden)
Rob Lundgren - vocals (Sweden)
Ivan Ravaioli - guitars (Italy)
Martino Garattoni - bass (Italy)
Malte Rathke - keys (Germany)
Sam Tickner - drums (U.K.)
